name: LuckyNumber
0:
”Alexa, ask Lucky Number to give me a lucky number”
”Alexa, ask Lucky Number to tell me lucky number”
”Alexa, ask Lucky Number to tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lucky number
des: A fun app to get a lucky number. Just ask it for a lucky number and it will tell you a number between 0 and 100. You can use this skill to decide on a "lucky" number to use in your life, to come up with lotto numbers, or even as a random number generator!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
